title: Comp Crunch
headline: Export your zillow search
description:
Zillow provides users with the ability to look at tons of real estate data online which is amazing, but sometimes you need a wholistic view of the data so you can do your own analysis. 

With the Comp Crunch Chrome extension, you can easily analyze and/or export any Zillow search. This saves you time spent talking to real estate agents or laboriously copy and pasting data points into excel! We offer the ability to export your Zillow search data as either a PDF or CSV file. Additionally, we provide a quick summary of your searched area by showing the average, median, 25th percentile and 75th percentile prices of the results in your search. You also can see how sold homes have trended in an area over time.

title: Appraisal Inbox
headline: Appraisal Inbox combines appraisal order tracking, workflow automation, scheduling, contact management, and communication tools into one comprehensive real estate appraisal software package.
description:
Appraisal Inbox is an appraisal software designed for real estate appraisers. It combines order tracking, workflow automation, scheduling, contact management, and communication tools into one platform. This software helps appraisers streamline their appraisal business, from managing orders to delivering value to clients.

The software provides an appraisal assignment log that tracks orders through each step of the valuation process. This ensures appraisers are informed about the status of an order. Appraisal Inbox also includes a team calendar, scheduling features, and automated reminders to help appraisers meet client deadlines and deliver appraisals on time. Additionally, the software stores all order information and work files in a secure database with daily backups, providing search and filtering capabilities.

Appraisal Inbox offers reporting tools that automatically calculate important business metrics. This helps appraisers make informed decisions by focusing on key trends. The software also makes collaboration simple, with configurable user roles and permissions, as well as automatic commission tracking.

We automatically categorize and organize that data and use it to build a knowledge base of your project. You can model everything related to your project directly within Deco Base, or alternatively can download the extracted info to use in excel models. 

With the knowledge base, Deco Base is able to automate and perfectly execute many of the document based tasks that developers have to do. We're thrilled to announce the launch of Realie.ai's Property Data API! 🏡✨

At Realie.ai, we’ve reimagined property data collection and accessibility, leveraging AI-powered automation to streamline data collection from every county in the United States. This innovation allows us to keep overhead low, passing those savings directly to you with prices that beat competitors—without sacrificing quality.

What Makes Our API Different?
💡 Flexible Search
Tired of rigid search options? So were we. That’s why we built Apache Lucene-powered search into our API, offering lightning-fast, flexible queries that make finding the exact data you need a breeze.

📊 Advanced Analytics
We’re not just providing data—we’re building free analytics around it. Our platform will help you unlock powerful insights, no extra costs required.

Our work doesn’t stop at raw data. We’re training machine learning models to create a cost-effective, accurate AVM (Automated Valuation Model) and developing an assistant powered by RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation). This assistant will help you:

Discover insights hidden in the data
Generate custom analytics
Digest large datasets seamlessly
🌎 Comprehensive Coverage
Our API covers every corner of the U.S., giving you access to rich, nationwide property data in one place.

title: Casafy AI
headline: Search for value add properties across the United States
description:
Casafy transforms real estate investment by making properties searchable based on their actual condition and features across the entire United States. This innovative platform addresses one of the most persistent challenges facing real estate investors: the time-consuming and often ineffective process of manually scouting neighborhoods or relying on incomplete data to identify distressed or neglected properties. Instead of driving countless miles or making educated guesses, investors can now efficiently locate opportunities at scale through intelligent, data-driven search capabilities.

For value-added investors, Casafy represents a breakthrough in off-market property discovery. The platform is the first of its kind to identify distressed properties based on their physical condition, powered by a proprietary AI model that analyzes street-level data across North America. This technology enables investors to pinpoint properties with renovation potential or condition-based indicators that traditional listing services simply cannot capture, giving them a significant competitive advantage in finding lucrative investment opportunities before they become widely known in the market.

headline: Elementix is a borrower intelligence platform that lets private lenders search real estate investors by name and understand their experience, activity, and lending patterns.
description:
Elementix gives private lenders a clear view of the real people behind borrowing entities. The platform extracts signatures from county documents, connects them to mortgage records, and builds unified borrower profiles that show loans, properties, partners, and market activity. Lenders can finally search investors by name with accuracy, not guesswork.

Beyond identity resolution, Elementix delivers advanced insights that help lenders source new opportunities, monitor client behavior, and spot churn risk earlier. With enriched contact information, portfolio context, and borrower movement data across markets, Elementix becomes a single source of truth for understanding who your borrowers are and how they operate.
